form.title: New Test Run
form.description: Configure the parameters for your k6 load test, Lighthouse audit, and AI SEO analysis.
form.urlDescription: The full URL of the endpoint or page you want to test.
form.searchUrlPlaceholder: Search or select a recent URL...
form.testSuitesDescription: Select one or more test suites to run against the target URL.
form.k6SwitchDescription: Simulate traffic to analyze performance under load.
form.lighthouseSwitchDescription: Audit for performance, accessibility, and SEO.
form.seoSwitchDescription: Use AI to analyze on-page SEO factors.

error.atLeastOne: You must select at least one test suite to run.

form.requestConfigDescription: Define the HTTP request details for the load test.
form.loadProfileDescription: Choose a preset or define a custom load profile for the k6 test.
form.customProfileDescription: Manually set Virtual Users (VUs), duration, or ramping stages.
form.stagesDescription: Define how VUs ramp up and down over time.

toast.historyClearedDescription: Your previous test history and recent URLs have been cleared.
toast.testStartedDescription: Your tests are now running. You will be redirected to the results page shortly.

clearHistoryDialog.title: Clear Previous History?
clearHistoryDialog.description: Starting a new test run will clear all previous test history and recent URLs. Do you want to proceed?

descriptions.custom: Define your own VUs and stages.

running.title: Test Running...
running.description: Your tests are in progress. Please wait for all suites to complete. You can view the live load test dashboard on Grafana.

summary.title: Test Run Complete
summary.description: Review the summary of your test run for {{url}} below.
summary.noK6Data: k6 load test data is not available for this run.
summary.noLighthouseData: Lighthouse audit data is not available for this run.
summary.noSeoData: SEO analysis data is not available for this run.

history.title: Test History
history.description: Review, re-run, or export your past test runs.

clearAllDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
clearAllDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your test history and recent URLs.

history.noHistoryDescription: Run a new test from the home page to start building your history.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete this test run from your history.

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your test history has been saved as a JSON file.
toast.exportFailDescription: Could not export your test history.
toast.importSuccessDescription: Your test history has been successfully imported.
toast.importFailDescription: The selected file could not be read or is not a valid history file.
toast.deleteSuccessDescription: The test run has been removed from your history.
toast.clearSuccessDescription: All test runs have been deleted.

about.title: About K6 Commander
about.description: A local-first, open-source platform for running load tests, Lighthouse audits, and SEO checks with a sleek, responsive web UI.
about.localFirstDescription: Your data is yours. All test configurations and results are stored in your browser's LocalStorage, not on our servers.
about.unifiedToolingDescription: Stop juggling tools. Run load tests, Lighthouse audits, and API checks from a single, cohesive interface.
about.k6FeatureDescription: Harness the power of Grafana k6 to understand how your system performs under load.
about.k6HowItWorks: When you run a load test, the app spins up a temporary k6 Docker container.
about.k6HowItWorks2: This container sends its metrics in real-time to a local InfluxDB database, which you can visualize live in a pre-configured Grafana dashboard.
about.lighthouseFeatureDescription: Get Google's official audits for performance, accessibility, and more.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks: The app runs the Lighthouse CLI in a separate process, targeting your URL.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks2: It generates a detailed JSON and HTML report, which are then parsed and displayed in a summarized view, with a link to the full report.
about.seoFeatureDescription: Go beyond standard checks with AI-driven on-page SEO insights.
about.seoHowItWorks: The app fetches the raw HTML of your URL and sends it to the Google AI (Gemini) API.
about.seoHowItWorks2: The AI analyzes key SEO factors and provides actionable recommendations for improvement, which are then displayed in the report.
about.apiTesterFeatureDescription: A full-featured client to test any API endpoint with ease.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks: Make requests directly from your browser. All history is saved locally, just like your test runs.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks2: Features include cURL import, saved collections, and a detailed view of response headers, bodies, and metrics.
about.stackDescription: Built with modern, powerful, and open-source technologies.
about.involvedDescription: K6 Commander is open source and community-driven. We welcome contributions, bug reports, and feature requests.

apiTester.newCollectionDescription: Create a new collection to organize your API requests.

deleteCollectionDialog.title: Delete Collection?
deleteCollectionDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the '{{name}}' collection and all of its requests? This action cannot be undone.

deleteRequestDialog.title: Delete Request?
deleteRequestDialog.description: This will permanently delete this request from your history.

apiTester.noRequestsDescription: Your sent requests will appear here.

toast.cannotDeleteDefault: Cannot delete the default 'Scratch Pad' collection.
toast.curlImportErrorDescription: Please paste a valid cURL command.
toast.curlImportSuccessDescription: The request has been loaded into the form.
toast.curlCopyInvalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL before copying.
toast.curlCopyErrorDescription: Could not generate or copy the cURL command.
toast.apiCurlCopiedDescription: The request has been copied to your clipboard as a cURL command.

importCurlDialog.title: Import from cURL
importCurlDialog.description: Paste a cURL command below to automatically populate the request fields. Limited support for complex commands.

apiTester.noResponseYetDesc: Send a request to see the response here.

quickAccess.title: Command Center
quickAccess.description: Quickly navigate to any part of the application.
